==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|い|ぜん|けい|yomi=o}}

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|いぜんけい|acc=h|acc_ref=DJR,NHK|y=ko}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|いぜんけい}}

# {{lb|ja|grammar|sort=いぜんけい}} a verbal inflectional category; the [[realis]] form as used in classical Japanese. Indicates that something is already the case, or is in the process of happening. The 已然形 has evolved into the [[仮定形]] ([[conditional]] form) now used in modern Japanese.

* {{ja-r|終止形|しゅうしけい|gloss=[[conclusive]]}}
* {{ja-r|未然形|みぜんけい|gloss=[[irrealis]]}}
* {{ja-r|命令形|めいれいけい|gloss=[[imperative]]}}
* {{ja-r|連用形|れんようけい|gloss=[[adverbial]]}}
* {{ja-r|連体形|れんたいけい|gloss=[[attributive]]}}
